mapper.select: SELECT m.m_title AS m_title, mh.mh_name AS mh_name FROM musical m JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code WHERE m.mh_code = #{mh_code}

SELECT mo_date_with_day FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(mo.mo_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') AS mo_date_with_day FROM musical m JOIN musical_option mo ON m.m_code = mo.m_code WHERE m.mh_code = #{mh_code} ) ORDER BY mo_date_with_day
SELECT DISTINCT mo_time AS Time FROM musical_option WHERE mo_date = TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY mo_time ASC
SELECT s.*, sg.sg_name FROM seat s JOIN seat_grade sg ON s.sg_code = sg.sg_code ORDER BY sg.sg_name DESC
